message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the cash flow statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly known as depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section there is a line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45749.30.

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, so this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.30'} }
```
